ygData.subject: Re: Enstill and the petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, Just made Level 20 and I was wondering if anyone can tell me where to find the spell Enstill or if it is research only.  I m aware that it can be
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

Just made Level 20 and I was wondering if anyone can tell me where to
find the spell Enstill or if it is research only. I'm aware that it can be
researched, unfortunately I have been unable to locate the correct Runes.
I've searched far and wide with no luck. Any help would be greatly
appreciated.

On another note, what happened to that petition to Verant about our
class? Did it ever get sent? Just curious.

Fair Winds and Following Seas,

Maureen, Lvl 20 Wiz, Povar

P.S. Force Shock rules! 171 damage a pop. Oh my gawd, that's very nice.
Hasn't been resisted yet either. Maybe this is the level where it all
starts to come together. (hopefully)
